description: Generates structured release notes from commit messages.

parameters.name: commits
parameters.description: A list of commit messages to be used as the basis for the release notes.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version number of the release.

parameters.name: releaseDate
parameters.description: The release date for the release notes.

parameters.name: releaseNotes
parameters.description: Structured release notes based on the provided commit messages, version, and release date.

versioning.handleVersionFallback: If the version is not explicitly provided, the system will attempt to retrieve the latest git tag or default to 'v0.0.1'.
